org.zelvator.timer

Class TestTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zelvator.timer.TestTimer

  • public class TestTimer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows to add Timer on the Tester. When loaded, timer will start adding seconds, converting to minutes or hours as needed and also it allows to pause and continue as you click on buttons on the Tester.
